history.narrative: Law 20-49, the “Bicycle Safety Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-140. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2013, and October 1, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 17, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-188 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-49 became effective on December 13, 2013.
